GSD.product_version: versions from v5.6 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
wireguard: allowedips: don't corrupt stack when detecting overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 38c9cc68e36f2cb82d4129e1e00692b76355bef6, it was introduced in version v5.6 by commit e7096c131e5161fa3b8e52a650d7719d2857adfd. For more details please see the references link.
